summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1668, for the improvement of Phinney Avenue, from North Fiftieth Street to North Sixty-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing water mains therein, together with such gates, tees, connecting pipes and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 17607 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
